original: rdo rje ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes 'dus byas kyi grong khyer ma lus par rab tu 'jig pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes 'dus byas kyi grong khyer ma lus par rab tu 'jig pa ste /
translated: The vajra is the non-conceptual exalted wisdom that completely destroys the city of the compounded.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:🔽The vajra of exalted wisdom, which destroys the city of the compounded,

original: bskal pa du mar rab tu goms byas pa'i //
analyzed: bskal pa du mar rab tu goms byas pa'i //
translated: is taught by the noble ones who have cultivated it for many eons,

original: rgyu dang rigs tshul dang ni sa la mkhas //🔽gang gi 'dus byas grong khyer rnam 'jig pa'i //🔽ye shes rdo rje ba stan te 'phags bdag stsol //🔽zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: rgyu dang rigs tshul dang ni sa la mkhas // gang gi 'dus byas grong khyer rnam 'jig pa'i // ye shes rdo rje ba stan te 'phags bdag stsol // zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
translated: who are skilled in the methods of the causes and the levels.

original: rdo rje zhes gnyis pa smos pa ni chos kyi dbyings te /
analyzed: rdo rje zhes gnyis pa smos pa ni chos kyi dbyings te /
translated: The second vajra refers to the expanse of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings rab tu'am mi phyed pa rdo rje lta bu 'dis rab tu brjod do zhes bshad pas so //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings rab tu'am mi phyed pa rdo rje lta bu 'dis rab tu brjod do zhes bshad pas so //
translated: Since it is explained that this vajra-like indivisibility of the realm of phenomena is expressed,

original: de nas rdo rje yis rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid thob pa'i tshogs kyi rgyal po nyid du ba stan to //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje yis rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid thob pa'i tshogs kyi rgyal po nyid du ba stan to //
translated: then the vajra-holder is taught to be the king of the assembly of those who attain suchness.

original: da ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i bstod pa /
analyzed: da ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i bstod pa /
translated: Now, the praise of the enjoyment body:

original: sku rdo rje dang / gsung rdo rje dang / thugs rdo rje rnam par dbyer med pa'i ngo bor gyur pa'i sku ni de dag 'dzin pa ste ;
analyzed: sku rdo rje dang / gsung rdo rje dang / thugs rdo rje rnam par dbyer med pa'i ngo bor gyur pa'i sku ni de dag 'dzin pa ste ;
translated: The body is the essence of the indivisibility of vajra body, vajra speech, and vajra mind.

original: sku snga ma gnyis kyang 'di'i thugs nyid yin la /
analyzed: sku snga ma gnyis kyang 'di'i thugs nyid yin la /
translated: The two previous bodies are also the mind itself.

original: sprul pa'i sku yang 'di nyid kyi snang ba skes pa las gzhan ma yin zhing /
analyzed: sprul pa'i sku yang 'di nyid kyi snang ba skes pa las gzhan ma yin zhing /
translated: The emanation body is also not other than the appearance arising from this very [mind].

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: sku la sogs pa ji snyed pa /
analyzed: sku la sogs pa ji snyed pa /
translated: as many as there are bodies,

original: sku 'di nyid yin pa'i dbang du byas te bstod pa'o //
analyzed: sku 'di nyid yin pa'i dbang du byas te bstod pa'o //
translated: this very body is praised.

original: da ni rnam par smin pa'i sprul pa'i sku'i dbang du byas te /
analyzed: da ni rnam par smin pa'i sprul pa'i sku'i dbang du byas te /
translated: Now, from the perspective of the fully matured emanation body:

original: rdo rje ltar mi phyed pas na /
analyzed: rdo rje ltar mi phyed pas na /
translated: Since it is indivisible like a vajra,

original: zab pa'i sku'i ngo bo ste /
analyzed: zab pa'i sku'i ngo bo ste /
translated: it is the profound essence of the body.

original: sku de yang chos kyi dbyings las /
analyzed: sku de yang chos kyi dbyings las /
translated: That body is also not other than the dharmadhatu,

original: gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: because

original: chos kyi dbyings las ma gtogs pa //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings las ma gtogs pa //
translated: apart from the dharmadhatu

original: gang phyir chos yod ma yin te //🔽zhes gsungs pas so //
analyzed: gang phyir chos yod ma yin te // zhes gsungs pas so //
translated: there is no existent phenomenon.

original: sku de yang /
analyzed: sku de yang /
translated: That body is also🔽great, because it is very vast, in the manner of🔽the statement:

original: la lar me bzhin mya ngan 'da' //
analyzed: la lar me bzhin mya ngan 'da' //
translated: In some places it is like fire, nirvana,

original: la lar rdzogs par byang chub ston //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu yang rgya che bas na sku che ba zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: la lar rdzogs par byang chub ston // zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu yang rgya che bas na sku che ba zhes gsungs te /
translated: in some places it shows complete enlightenment.

original: de ltar sku bzhi'i bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de ltar sku bzhi'i bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes gsungs te /
translated: Thus, I pay homage to you, Vajrapani, whose nature is the four bodies.

original: tshig rkang gnyis po 'di ni tshogs ma lus pa'i mthar spyar bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: tshig rkang gnyis po 'di ni tshogs ma lus pa'i mthar spyar bar shes par bya'o //
translated: These two lines should be applied at the end of all the collections.

original: 'di ni rnam par smin pa ma yin pa'i sprul pa'i sku'i dbang du phal cher byas te /🔽'gro ba ngan pa'am /
analyzed: 'di ni rnam par smin pa ma yin pa'i sprul pa'i sku'i dbang du phal cher byas te / 'gro ba ngan pa'am /
translated: This is mainly from the perspective of the non-maturation emanation body.🔽Whether born in a bad realm

original: gya nom pa gang du skyes kyang ngo bo nyid kyi sku las mi 'da' bas na /
analyzed: gya nom pa gang du skyes kyang ngo bo nyid kyi sku las mi 'da' bas na /
translated: or a good realm, one does not transcend the nature body.

original: rdo rje'i yan lag ces bya ba la sogs pas bstod do //
analyzed: rdo rje'i yan lag ces bya ba la sogs pas bstod do //
translated: The vajra limbs and so forth are praised.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di thugs rje chen pos bskul bas srid pa dang zhi ba thams cad du snang bas ston te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di thugs rje chen pos bskul bas srid pa dang zhi ba thams cad du snang bas ston te /
translated: The Blessed One, urged by great compassion, manifests in all of existence and peace.

original: 'di skad du gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: 'di skad du gsungs pa yang /
translated: It is also said:🔽The gods who hear the speech of Vajradhara, the asuras, yakshas, siddhas,🔽vidyadharas, nagas, yakshas, gandharvas,

original: @341a * // rdo rje 'chang gi gsung thos lha rnams dang // tshang sogs lha min gnod spyin grub pa dang // rig 'dzin klu dang gnod spyin dri za dang // gsang ba pa dang mtshung dang 'byung po rnams //
analyzed: @341a * // rdo rje 'chang gi gsung thos lha rnams dang // tshang sogs lha min gnod spyin grub pa dang // rig 'dzin klu dang gnod spyin dri za dang // gsang ba pa dang mtshung dang 'byung po rnams //
translated: guhyakas, rakshasas, and bhutas,

original: dad pas zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dad pas zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: with faith, bow their heads to his feet.

original: gus pas thal mo spyar nas tshig gsol ba //
analyzed: gus pas thal mo spyar nas tshig gsol ba //
translated: With devotion, their palms joined, they say:

original: kye ma srog chags rnams la thugs rjer ldan //
analyzed: kye ma srog chags rnams la thugs rjer ldan //
translated: Oh, you who have compassion for living beings!

original: kye ma khyod kyi spyod pa sna tshogs pas //
analyzed: kye ma khyod kyi spyod pa sna tshogs pas //
translated: Oh, by your various deeds,

original: / kha cig gis ni rdo rje 'bar bar mthong //
analyzed: / kha cig gis ni rdo rje 'bar bar mthong //
translated: some see you as the blazing vajra,

original: gzhan gyis dbyig to gzhan gyis 'khor lo dang // de bzhin gzhan gyis rtse gsum 'bar ba can //
analyzed: gzhan gyis dbyig to gzhan gyis 'khor lo dang // de bzhin gzhan gyis rtse gsum 'bar ba can //
translated: others as the club, others as the chakra, and likewise others as the blazing trident.

original: gzhan gyis ral gyi gzhu dang be con can //
analyzed: gzhan gyis ral gyi gzhu dang be con can //
translated: Others see him as a terrifying form, holding all weapons,🔽With a bow and club, and a terrifying form.

original: 'jigs pa'i gzugs can mtshon cha kun thogs dang // gzhan dag kun gyi zhi ba nyid du mthong //
analyzed: 'jigs pa'i gzugs can mtshon cha kun thogs dang // gzhan dag kun gyi zhi ba nyid du mthong //
translated: Others see him as peaceful,

original: du ma'i sku mnga' dmigs med sku mnga' bar //
analyzed: du ma'i sku mnga' dmigs med sku mnga' bar //
translated: With many bodies, with a body that is not an object of perception.

original: lha dang gnod spyin gyis mthong de la 'dud //
analyzed: lha dang gnod spyin gyis mthong de la 'dud //
translated: Gods and yakshas see him and bow to him.

original: lha min lha yis zhabs la phyag bgyis pa //
analyzed: lha min lha yis zhabs la phyag bgyis pa //
translated: Demigods and gods pay homage at his feet.

original: byang chub sems dpa' mchog rab khyod la 'dud //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' mchog rab khyod la 'dud //
translated: I bow to you, supreme bodhisattva.

original: rig sngags gzhu 'gengs khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
analyzed: rig sngags gzhu 'gengs khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
translated: I bow to you, wielder of the knowledge mantra bow.

original: khyod la bdag cag deng ni skyabs su mchi //
analyzed: khyod la bdag cag deng ni skyabs su mchi //
translated: We now go for refuge to you.

original: zhes pas / bcom ldan 'das 'di la bstod pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhes pas / bcom ldan 'das 'di la bstod pa lta bu'o //
translated: Thus, it is like praising the Blessed One.

original: de tsam du snang ba ston par spyod pas na /
analyzed: de tsam du snang ba ston par spyod pas na /
translated: Because he acts by displaying appearances to that extent,

original: rdo rje can khyod ni lha rnams kyi nang na mchog nyid do zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstod pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje can khyod ni lha rnams kyi nang na mchog nyid do zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstod pa ste /
translated: You, O Vajra Holder, are supreme among the gods.

original: tshig gi don ni go sla bas rnam par ma phye'o //
analyzed: tshig gi don ni go sla bas rnam par ma phye'o //
translated: The meaning of the words is easy to understand, so it is not analyzed.

original: gang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
analyzed: gang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
translated: By what means, etc.

original: bstod pa bris pa la sogs pa'i yon tan bsdus te bstan pa'o //
analyzed: bstod pa bris pa la sogs pa'i yon tan bsdus te bstan pa'o //
translated: The qualities of the one who has written the praise, etc. are summarized and taught.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
translated: With “The Blessed One,” etc.

original: rjes su yi rang ba ba stan to //
analyzed: rjes su yi rang ba ba stan to //
translated: the rejoicing is taught.

original: rab zab rgyud 'di'i snying po ni //
analyzed: rab zab rgyud 'di'i snying po ni //
translated: The essence of this Tantra, which is very profound,

original: bdag gis 'dir brjod kho nar zad //
analyzed: bdag gis 'dir brjod kho nar zad //
translated: has been stated here by me alone.

original: gang du gzhung don rnam ma phye //
analyzed: gang du gzhung don rnam ma phye //
translated: Where the meaning of the text has not been analyzed,

original: bla ma mnyes par byas la blang //
analyzed: bla ma mnyes par byas la blang //
translated: it should be taken from pleasing the guru.

original: 'dir ni 'khrul gyur lha rnams la //
analyzed: 'dir ni 'khrul gyur lha rnams la //
translated: Here, to the gods who have erred,

original: bzod smra dge ba gang yin des //
analyzed: bzod smra dge ba gang yin des //
translated: I say “forbearance,” and whatever virtue there is in that,

original: 'gro pa rgyal 'gyur ngan 'gro spangs //
analyzed: 'gro pa rgyal 'gyur ngan 'gro spangs //
translated: may it cause the world to be victorious, abandoning bad destinies,🔽and may I also become a Buddha.

original: bdag kyang sangs rgyas 'gyur bar shog /'phags pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba /
analyzed: bdag kyang sangs rgyas 'gyur bar shog /'phags pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba /
translated: The Noble Great King of Sutras, the Purification of All Bad Transmigrations,

original: cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po'i rgya cher 'grel pa /
analyzed: cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po'i rgya cher 'grel pa /
translated: the Commentary on the Great King of Sutras, the Essence of the Tathagata

original: snying po rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: snying po rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba /
translated: the Explanation of the Essence,

original: dza' lndha ra'i rdo rje slob dpon /
analyzed: dza' lndha ra'i rdo rje slob dpon /
translated: by the Vajra Master of Jalandhara,

original: k'a ma deha nu pa zhes bya ba'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: k'a ma deha nu pa zhes bya ba'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: the one named Kamadevanu, is finished.

original: // / a'a ts'a rya bi na ya tsandra dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis /
analyzed: // / a'a ts'a rya bi na ya tsandra dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis /
translated: Ācārya Vinayacandra and the Tibetan translator, the monk Chökyi Sherab,

original: 'phan yul rgyal gyi lugs lhas su bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'phan yul rgyal gyi lugs lhas su bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa rdzogs so /
translated: translated, revised, and finalized this text at the temple of Gyal Lhakhang in Penyül.
